children.text: There is a visible dent in the roofing sheet, which looks poorly finished.
Victorian Building Authority’s, Guide to Standards and Tolerances clause 6.02 Roof cladding states that

‘Staining, folds, splits, dents, open joints between panels, cracking and other distortions in roof cladding is defective if it is visible from a normal viewing position at ground level or an upper floor level’ .
This section of roof sheet should be replaced with a new one.
